summary: Completed comprehensive E2E testing of RIGHTNAME brand evaluation system. Backend API /api/evaluate working correctly with fixed JSON parsing. Frontend flow fully functional: form submission, LLM analysis, and dashboard display all working properly. Main JSON parsing bug successfully resolved.

design_issues.issue: Chart rendering warning: width(-1) and height(-1) should be greater than 0 - Recharts dimension issue

passed_tests: Backend API health check (/api/)
Backend /api/evaluate endpoint with TestBrand/Technology/USA payload
Backend JSON parsing robustness (main fix verified)
Backend error handling for invalid payloads
Frontend landing page loading and branding
Frontend form field filling (Brand Names: TestBrand, InnovaCorp)
Frontend form field filling (Category: Technology)
Frontend form field filling (Countries: USA, Canada, UK)
Frontend Generate Report button functionality
Frontend LLM analysis processing (90 second timeout)
Frontend redirection to /dashboard after analysis
Frontend dashboard display of TestBrand brand name
Frontend dashboard display of NameScore (25/100)
Frontend dashboard display of REJECT verdict
Frontend dashboard display of Executive Summary with FATAL CONFLICT detection
Frontend dashboard sections: Strategy Snapshot, Dimensions Analysis, Market Intelligence
Frontend dashboard sections: Competitive Landscape, Legal Risk Matrix, Detailed Framework Analysis
Domain analysis section functionality
Trademark matrix section functionality
Cultural analysis section functionality
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor chart rendering warning in BrandRadarChart component - Recharts library needs proper container dimensions. This is cosmetic and doesn't affect functionality. Consider adding minWidth/minHeight props or fixing container CSS.
